nodes.bodyText:
Instead of adding the quickstart's jar and sources-jar, we include the "build from source" sources instead. This has 2 advantages:

users can get started with the quickstart by building and running it from source.
we don't need to depend on artifacts from the quickstart, which causes issues when productized and when pushed to maven central (we don't own groupId "com.examples").
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -63,13 +63,26 @@
         <exclude>.git/**</exclude>
       </excludes>
     </fileSet>
+    <fileSet><!-- Note: going outside the module dir is bad, but it is not fetching generated files -->
+      <directory>../optaplanner-quickstarts/spring-boot-school-timetabling</directory>
+      <outputDirectory>quickstarts/spring-boot-school-timetabling</outputDirectory>
+      <excludes>
+        <exclude>target/**</exclude>
+        <exclude>local/**</exclude>
+        <exclude>.*/**</exclude>
+        <exclude>nbproject/**</exclude>
+        <exclude>*.ipr</exclude>
+        <exclude>*.iws</exclude>
+        <exclude>*.iml</exclude>
+        <exclude>.git/**</exclude>
+      </excludes>
+    </fileSet>

nodes.bodyText:
Probably should have been in a separate PR, as it's unrelated, but let's just merge it along.
Anyway, took me 2 weeks to figure out this one line workaround fix (master doesn't suffer from it).
